website_summaries.verdict: An attractive lamp that puts out a warm, glowing light, although there have been some complaints about quality issues.
pros: Comes in your choice of black or brown
Pull chain makes it easy to turn the lamp on and off without having to hunt for a switch
cons: Some customers had issues with the USB port not working, while others felt the look and construction were of low quality

customer_reviews.title: Bad Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Worst lamp ever!! Very badly made and surprised at the good ratings. The only thing I can think of is the earlier purchases were sent a more “quality” lamp. What I got was a cheaply made lamp of which the base was made of some type of lightweight material covered by what looked like a thin version of electrical tape that was coming apart at the corners. BRIGHTECH backs their product a 100% (AS STATED), commited to make sure you loved you purchase (AS STATED) and if not satisfied, wants to make things right (AS STATED)...well in looking into more of the customer reviews...you didn’t do what you STATED. I WILL NOT be purchasing anything from BRIGHTECH in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: BEDSIDE READING IN STYLE
customer_reviews.text: This lamp was required to fit in a small space and it did that very well, simple in design but pleasing to the eye as well. We really like the LED bulb included, a nice extra that usually does not come with lamps from other suppliers, also the USB port is very handy to charge cell phones etc. All in all we are very pleased with this product, the price, and would recommend it to anyone requiring a practical well designed small table lamp, two thumbs up and five stars for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Beddington

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Assembled
customer_reviews.text: Quality control of the finished product is poor. While the lamp is cute and modern with the linen canvas material and faux wood base, both lamps received were crooked, one more obviously so than the other. Construction is sturdy, so it wasn't damaged in transit, it was just mounted improperly during production. Too bad; deciding whether to send one or both back.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: The light is perfect for bedroom
customer_reviews.text: The light is perfect for bedroom! It is a terrific bonus that these are warm LED bulbs! I purchased one lamp for each bedside table and the light is soft and warm but illuminates very well. When one lamp is on the light is easily sufficient for reading and television viewing and when both are on the room is completely but softly illuminated. If I had a criticism I would wish the lamp was just a few inches taller. If these lamps are durable over time (and they come with a 3 year warranty), they are a complete home run!
customer_reviews.author: Lillehammer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and functional
customer_reviews.text: So not sure what all the fuss was about in some of the reviews. I thought these lamps are pretty good. This is a newer model so it has the chain pull. It came with a working light bulb and it's charging my phone as I type. I'm glad I bought two of them. They are very bright so there is plenty of light for reading.
customer_reviews.author: Kyoko

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful addition to our home.
customer_reviews.text: We bought a pair of these lamps and for the last week nearly every time my wife or I have walked into the living room one of us has said, out loud “How much do you love these lamps?!” They are exactly what was needed for the space. They brighten and warm up the room. The USB ports are priceless. My wife joked “Our whole living room looks better...heck, even you look better!” These wonderful lamps are just what we’ve been missing around here. It’s a rare thing to be moved to write a review for a lamp, but suffice it to say, we are huge fans of the look, quality, and utility of these lamps. Super-duper highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: You'd think that spending $35 on a lamp would get you at least a decent build quality but that is not at all the case with the Brightech Grace lamps. I ordered 2 lamps and both of them were falling apart at the seams. They are made with a cheap cardboard base with a laminated black finish which doesn't stick to the cardboard whatsoever. (see pics for example) If you're looking for nice desk lamps, look elsewhere. I would usually give a company the benefit of my doubts but since I ordered 2 and had the same problem with each, it's clear that their quality control is garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Matyja

customer_reviews.title: The perfect desk/bedside lamp
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if Brightech makes these or resells them but this lamp is a winner. It looks great on a desk or bedside table. It's bright yet not obtrusive. The built-in USB port means you can plug in your gear and recharge. Even the pull chain looks great. The pictures I took were during the day but with my curtains and blinds closed. The lamp is 5 inches wide and a tad over 14 inches tall. The power cord is about 3 feet long but I didn't measure that. This is my second Brightech lamp and I'm already looking at additional Brightech lamps for other rooms. They are just awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Ewasiuk

customer_reviews.title: Lovely lamp for the price - highly recommended (buy two!)
customer_reviews.text: Just got this lamp (two actually) to fill two dark spots in my kitchen. Wow - so impressed with a lamp at this price. It's really well made, has a handy USB port, and comes with a very nice lightbulb, too. The packaging protected the lamp shade and bulb, and the lamp took about a minute to easily assemble. Although small and compact, this provides a nice shot of light - not too bright, not too dim. This looks much more expensive than the price. I really liked the pull cord rather than those fussy on-the-plug on-off switches. I highly recommend this lamp (get a pair - you'll use them somewhere!).
customer_reviews.author: New Jersey Mama

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lamp. Sticker over the USB port leaves residue ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome lamp. Sticker over the USB port leaves residue when peeled off, just be careful how you remove it as the wood, while well built, is not really a "premium". I added stick on rubber things on the bottom to keep it from shifting or sliding on my nightstand. Great light. Looks awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Bedroom perfect and light abundant
customer_reviews.text: the two nightstand lamps with USB charger are perfect for the bedroom! They are sturdy, well built, and the pull chains are not flimsy. The shades are substantial, and well put together. Go and buy them, you will not be disappointed. Plus, you do not have to go out and purchase bulbs, they are included with the sale. Lauren, cofounder, followed up with me to see how the product worked and to see if they could do anything for me. Very nice to be proactive and check in with the customers! George
customer_reviews.author: George Ackerman-Behr

customer_reviews.title: Cute but cheap
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but very lightweight, so much so that it makes the USB port useless. Every time I go to grab (grab, not pull or yank) my phone, the lamp slides all over the place. They should have made a heavier base. Most likely will return. Separately, from a cost perspective, this has little value. Not worth the cost. Brighter should lower price or improve their parts.
customer_reviews.author: amazonshopper

customer_reviews.title: Cute lamp but USB doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: The style was exactly as I was looking for, but neither Lamp USB port worked. I wanted the lamp with the USB because of limited space on floating shelves as a bedside table and wanted to charge android phones. I tried various cables and USB chargeable devices. Nothing worked. Customer service was very responsive and nice. Said they contacted the seller and the seller said it should have worked. Zero charge was coming through either light except to turn on the light. Returned for refund as I wouldn't take a chance on this brand again. Seller was prompted and courteous on all emails and did call me back to.
customer_reviews.author: TLThomas

customer_reviews.title: Functional Little Lamp
customer_reviews.text: These are cute little lamps, not for reading in bed but nice for ambient lighting and a little brighter than you would expect. The shades are linen and attractive. We ordered one and then another. The second one arrived as an obviously repackaged job, with the shade abused, no light bulb and not packaged properly. We returned it and ordered another which came in perfect condition. We love the convenience of the pull chain. We would recommend it for what it is - a simple little convenient bedside lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Francie

customer_reviews.title: Another poorly manufactured Import
customer_reviews.text: A disappointing purchase. The design is nice and it actually looks fine at a distance but it is very cheaply, poorly made. It's so lightweight that it's hard to pull the chain without the lamp moving all over the place. The USB connector is flimsy and I'm certain will fail after little use. Basically a toy lamp, not worth the $40 asking price. Not recommended at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Nice warm light
customer_reviews.text: Nice warm light, bright enough to fill half my room. I only use it at night, and it helps me wind down for sleep. The included usb charger is a helpful touch. The packaging the lamp came in looks like it was thrown together without much care, and the parts feel very cheap. The lamp is very light and easy to shift the lamp. Yanking the pull chain even a little bit sideways will move the lamp. I wish it had better build quality and heft to keep it from moving.
customer_reviews.author: Don Q

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, comes with LED bulb, only 1 amp USB charging
customer_reviews.text: Great looking little lamp. Perfect for nightstands. The only issues I have are that the USB port is 1 amp, and that there's only 1 USB port. I'd buy a 2 amp 2 port replacement in a heartbeat. One other issue is that there's a chance you can loosen the pole that holds up the bulb and lampshade. To fix it, you have to take the felt off the bottom and unscrew the protective plate, then hold the bolt tight while you screw the stand tighter.
customer_reviews.author: Shidarin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Love the light output, asthetic look of this lamp. Also the fact that it doesn't have a switch on the wire makes it more convenient when your next to the bed. Only improvement would be to offer additional USB ports and put those ports on the center of of the lamp vs on the side which don't fit the way I have set up my room
customer_reviews.author: Suvi Viswanathan

customer_reviews.title: like me, you want to change channels on TV ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality of light is lovely if, like me, you want to change channels on TV and see what you are doing. The light overhead I have is too bright, the one I have over my computer desk shines in my eyes as I sit on the couch. This lamp is small enough to place on the floor behind me and let it shine just the right amount of light for my needs. The best feature is the charger. Last night I charged my phone from 33 to 100% while watching the bad news on TV for a few hours. I highly recommend this elegant nicely designed lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: love it, just be careful when you take it out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp. it's perfect for my desk. just one thing. be careful when you pull the lamp out of the box. I somehow loosened the pole from the bottom base. so now the top doesn't stay still. so if you touch the lamp, the shade will move around. if my fault because I own another one. and that one is just fine.
customer_reviews.author: G. Rascon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bedside lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect bedside lamp, just the right size. What I love most is tha the shape and size of the shade insures you are not blinded by the glare of the bulb because the light is being directed upward. Plenty of light with the included bulb to read. What my guest love most is the easy access to the USB port for charging their phone. The only con I have is there is no real selection of base color. I love that it is wood, but different stains (such as a lighter more natural look) would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Silverpony

customer_reviews.title: Nice bedside lamp, with USB port on left side of lamp.
customer_reviews.text: Nice bedside lamp. Small, but plenty bright enough. The only drawback for me is that the USB port is on the left side of the lamp. I would have preferred it on the front, and my nightstand is on the left of our bed, so the port is away from me. To move it, the cord would be coming out the side instead of the back. Doesn’t bother me enough to return it. Just would’ve preferred to have the port in front.
customer_reviews.author: WCDeb

customer_reviews.title: USB stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp mainly for access to the USB. It worked fine initially but then abruptly stopped working. Without the USB this lamp is of no use to me. For a short term this lamp is fine but the long term quality is unreliable. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Manish Parekhji

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The whole lamp appears to be not well made. Even though I followed instructions the lamp shade did not fit. Additionally the center metal stem was wobbly and could not be tightened. The only good part, which was the shade, is not usable as the rest of the lamp was not worth using or keeping.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B.

customer_reviews.title: Love this lamp!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my lamp!! It’s a nice smaller size lamp for a night stand (I keep a lot of stuff on there so it’s nice that the lamp doesn’t take up too much room). I love the USB port. Makes charging my phone at night very convenient. It gives off a good amount of light for being on the smaller size. I wasn’t sure how I’d like the pull chain to turn it on and off but I find that it doesn’t bother me. I would definitely recommend and would definitely buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Jennilyn Wesner

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamps.
customer_reviews.text: These are great little lamps. They give an incredible amount of light, truth be told, I changed the 60 Watt LED's (that came with the lamps) to 40 Watt Warm White LED's. The charging USB ports are brilliant and the pull chain is convenient. I did put some rubberized nubs on the bottom of the bases to keep the lamps in one spot as they are not that heavy. Over all I feel they were well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon

customer_reviews.title: Functional & attractive
customer_reviews.text: I didn't pay attention to the picture, in relation to the actual size but was still pleasantly surprised by this modern, good looking lamp! It grew on-me and now I just love it! The phone charger definitely sold-it, for me! Super handy for any household or office to have extra places to plug-in. Definitely recommend ✔ P.S. The reviews saying it's wobbly, it doesn't work properly etc., are not following the instructions properly!! LOOK at the diagram again. I had the same assembly issues UNTIL I really focused. Now it's sturdy & perfect. LOL
customer_reviews.author: HollyBee

customer_reviews.title: Why is it sitting crooked?
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful lamp but the pole isn’t sitting straight in the base so it’s leaning, sitting crooked. I can’t figure out how to get it seated in the base. Returning things to Amazon can be such a pain as I can’t be home for a pickup so have to drop it off at a UPS store. And I already moved the lamp that was next to my bed, getting it plugged into its new location wasn’t easy. Wish I could get another one of these sent before doing a return so I could see if this is a fluke or if I need to look for something completely different. But that’s expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Mercer

customer_reviews.title: It's a great lamp and USB charger in one!
customer_reviews.text: Needed to get a new bedside lamp after Hurricane Harvey wiped out my last one. I looked through the lamps on amazon.com and picked out this one. It's the perfect brilliance for a bedside lamp (enough light to be able to read easily, but not enough that you can't fall asleep when when it's on). I love the USB port on the side. I plug in my iPhone every night and it's charged every morning. The lamp's USB port doesn't generate as much power as an iPad AC adapter does, but it will still charge my iPad overnight.
customer_reviews.author: C. Perrin

customer_reviews.title: Attractive lamp, well priced, & not a space hog!
customer_reviews.text: The assembly which in theory is simple was complicated by having a part that apparently did not go with this lamp. Fortunately, the company was very quick to address my issue and is sending a replacement lamp! It is quite refreshing when a company helps out in such an expedient manner!! I'd add for those with a tight space on a nightstand, this lamp fits the bill!
customer_reviews.author: Ed Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Great bedside lamp
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these lamps, one for each nightstand. Lamps looks very nice. Imitates the rice paper shade lamps but with a much more durable lamp shade. I use Phillip hue colored smart lightbulbs in them and the color bulbs look nice through the lamp shade. The lamp base looks very nice as well. Super easy to assemble. USB port works well for charging cell phone. Would definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Cory Foster

customer_reviews.title: The USB port is great, however
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 as bedside lamps primarily for the USB port. The lamps came with an LED bulb which is really bright. I think I'll switch them out for bulbs that are a little cozier. The USB port is great, however, since the port is only on one side (to the right of the chain that hangs down), that means only one lamp will have the charging cable facing the side of the bed. The other lamp has the charging cable facing in the opposite direction. Not a big thing, but the love-of-symmetry-gene in me cringes a little. I wish the port had been in the back of the lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Jordana Burton

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lamp
customer_reviews.text: This lamp was just what I wanted for my office. I love the USB connector, and how you can turn it on/off on the lamp itself, instead of the cord as typical. The only thing I would change is to have a lamp that is less bright, for which I will be buying a replacement LED at some point. All in all a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Honestly, this is a sweet little lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love this little lamp. It’s unique and goes great on my tiny side table. I love that I can charge my iPad or iPhone and it even comes with an energy efficient light bulb. I have cats so to keep the shade still I used a dab of museum wax. Worked like a charm. Excellent! Me happy 😃
customer_reviews.author: Ms Maria

customer_reviews.title: Actually.... quite perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful & comes with its own bulb! I’m using a multi-colored faceted lightbulb for a softer glow and the colors can be seen through the shade. Looks amazing. Two minor notes: The base is a slightly uneven so it rocks a little a bit and when the shade is tightened all the way, it’s not square with the base. HOWEVER, both are not deal breakers. Just a minor readjustment here and 1/2 turn there, and it’s exactly what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: JSCK

customer_reviews.title: Light
customer_reviews.text: The lamps are very pretty and nicely small for night table but the light is too bright in my opinion for night light. I ordered 2 lamps. One for my night table and one gave to my son. He did not comment. I think he placed it in his LR. The desk lamps I have ordered initially one for a nephew , he loved it and I had to order two more for him. He loves them as they are very functional and especially that they can charge their cell phones by placing them on top without plugging them in.
customer_reviews.author: Alina Serdakowska

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but the quality of the base is a little lacking
customer_reviews.text: It's a really good lamp, but the wood base is a little disappointing. I was expecting the lamp to be of a little more quality, the whole lamp is pretty lightweight, and the base is definitely not even close to solid wood. (You can press against the bottom and the fabric seeps in.) I get there needs to be room for the charging port , but it's still awfully flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy the Cat

customer_reviews.title: Soft, bright light
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our bedside tables. They are small, but wonderfully bright. The shape is simple and elegant. I've seen complaints that there is not enough room between the base and the shade, making it clumsy to turn on and off, but that isn't a problem at all... it is easy to reach the pull cord, and it adds to the design.
customer_reviews.author: pamela caeley morrison

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love these lamps! I purchased 2 for my husband and I. They fit perfectly on our bed side tables. They give great light and just love that we can charge our phones from the USB in the base of the lamp. Super easy to put together and the led light bulb is included in the package. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: kjw

customer_reviews.title: they are exactly what they look like - good soft light
customer_reviews.text: So, they are exactly what they look like - good soft light, really easy to turn off and on with the chain, and like the look and color. I really like the USB plug in. The only thing which is more me is that I didn't pay attention to the size in the description. They are much smaller than I thought they would be. It's fine for the guest room, but I would measure it and see if it will balance with your nightstand or table appropriately.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lamp
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp. I bought two and put one in the bedroom and one next to the desk computer. I love these two lamps because there is no glare from them. I find the glare from a lamp to be exceedingly irritating, and it also makes me too warm. I love the pull chain; so many now are touch-controlled nowadays. Also love that there is a USB port. Simple and classy. Well protected in terms of packaging. Very prompt delivery. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: quonster

customer_reviews.title: Overall, decent bedside lamp
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of this lamp. I like that it has a pull chain as opposed to a switch on the wire and the USB charging port is very convenient. The center post on my lamp shipped slightly off center. I tried my best to bend it back to no avail. Its minor, but still bugged me. Also, its nice that the lamp came with an LED bulb, but it seemed a bit too harsh for my bedside, with the light being directed out of the top. I ended up switching it out.
customer_reviews.author: Mang Tae

customer_reviews.title: Has a nice minimalistic look and the USB port is a nice ...
customer_reviews.text: Has a nice minimalistic look and the USB port is a nice addition. It is a bit smaller than I expected, although, I didn't exactly get out a ruler and measure the dimensions before I bought it. Overall it is a solid product and I would recommend for those looking for a smaller nightstand lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Moore

customer_reviews.title: Overal great, bad "switch"
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product overall with a beautiful light for a very low cost. My only gripe is how you turn it on. The hanging pull is so far underneath and the lampshade is so loose that you have to either hold the lampshade down or reach awkwardly under it without touching to turn the thing on and off. Some better engineering could have been done here.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Fiction

customer_reviews.title: Great small lamp, ships with cool to touch bulb, comes with USB port!
customer_reviews.text: These small bedside table lights are great. The drawstring is responsive, and the usb port is perfect for charging your phone (or other device) over night. Best of all they arrive with their own LED lightbulbs which, so far, have never gotten hot to the touch. For me, this was very important, as I have a new kitten in the house. This is my third Brightech light. I decided to get this one for our guest room, because I liked the 2 in our master so much.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina U.

customer_reviews.title: Love this lamp
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these lamps for my night stands in my bedroom because it has a USB port. The USB ports only work when the light is on. The light is really bright for such a small lamp and they don't take too much room from my night stand. Just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lamps
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for our bedside and love them. Low profile, easy to operate, and the perfect amount of brightness. I ended up purchasing another lamp on a slightly different style from the same vendor for the dresser and it is excellent also.
customer_reviews.author: Mr ATC

customer_reviews.title: Cute lamp
customer_reviews.text: Love the lamp, it's a great size and has the right amount of light to use in an office. It came out of the package a bit crooked. When I tried to straighten it, the little plastic "ring" that connects the shade to the frame cracked - it was very thin and cheap. Luckily I was able to super glue it back together and use it to attach the shade. I was able to straighten the frame carefully with my hands, so I am using the lamp now and really like it. I would suggest improving the quality of this important piece.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Cooper McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Works but so light it falls over with a puff of the dog’s breath
customer_reviews.text: It works, and it looks OK, until you get up close. The thing is so late, it will blow over with a path of a dog’s breath. It’s nice that has a charger port built-in, though. I would not look to this to be a durable, long-term item. I guess it is a good value for the money I guess it is a good value for the money and is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: sdnelson11

customer_reviews.title: brightness for reading or writing
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is real nice and fits well on my side table, and, I like the pull chain idea. However, it is not as bright (even with a 60W equivalent LED bulb) that I thought it would be. I don't think it is the bulb as much as the shade itself which seems too opaque for light to shine through. I am struggling to see well enough for reading or writing. I will be buying another shade for it.
customer_reviews.author: DWS

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp, shade needed some more workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Other than the fact that the lamp shade is a bit off kilter I love this lamp. The included LED 60w equivalent bulb is a tad bright but toss in a 40w equivalent and boom, perfect table lamp. Do also wish the USB port was in the front by the chain as it is currently off to the opposite side from where I'd like it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp - Beats the competition for value.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, good quality... perfect for what I was looking for. The included LED bulb works very well. Note, I saw similar lamps on Amazon for less money, however, they did not include the bulb and did not have the USB port, thus, this definitely was the best value.
customer_reviews.author: g2bill

customer_reviews.title: Was excited at first...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two for our bedroom to sit on each side of the bed. They looked beautiful and I loved them at first until I realized that one is very loose in the base. It doesn't stand up straight and can't be tightened as far as I can see. The other is solid and I am tempted to buy a new one, am afraid of throwing good money after bad.
customer_reviews.author: jo5ie

customer_reviews.title: Are cheap, don't look cheap.
customer_reviews.text: I like these. The USB port is great and saves some desk space in my office. I use Alexa controlled light bulbs and they are perfect for practical or mood lighting. They look more expensive than they really are. I did have to bend one very slightly to get it to look perfectly vertical but, no big deal, took 15 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: J.T. Shaver

customer_reviews.title: Buy in bulk!!
customer_reviews.text: These lamps are so perfect! I ordered one for my office and was thrilled how elegant AND functional it looks on my desk! And the lighting is really good, adding just the right amount next to my computer. My coworders noticed how pretty the light is above and next to my wall. Me? I’m thrilled it has a USB port on the base and that I was smart enough to order a total of three lamps!!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Conlon

customer_reviews.title: recipient is very pleased.. He is using the lamp on entryway ...
customer_reviews.text: Lovely lamp. This was a gift item, recipient is very pleased. . He is using the lamp on entryway table and said it provides plenty of light for such a small footprint. Bonus that he can charge his phone from base of the lamp. All better than good!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Glowing Warmth
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful edition in my cottage nice warm natural look and feel.I purchased a couple of different bulbs that gives different illuminations all work great and blend perfectly with the shade, speaking of the shade it could have been a bit more stable, you need to address that a simple forced fit would be fine which I might eventually fix myself. Overall good reasonably priced product with lots of niceties.
customer_reviews.author: LDLKnows

customer_reviews.title: Right size lamp and a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect small lamp for my bedside table. It’s very modern looking and I like that there’s a USB port for charging my phone built into the base of the lamp. I think this was a great purchase and may buy another for my husband. It gives me plenty of light to read by and yet is still muted enough not to disturb my husband if he’s sleeping. I’m very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Catcrzymom

customer_reviews.title: Brightech desk lamp with usb is great!
customer_reviews.text: I have the Brighttech Grace LED USB lamp on a dresser beside my bed. The Linen shade and havana brown wood base blends perfectly with the mid 50s walnut finish furniture. I leave the light on as a warm welcoming light for the room. The best part is having the USB port which works for most electronic devises except laptops.
customer_reviews.author: B. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great look and great lighting!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bedside light!! It is made well and just the right size. I bought it for our guest bedroom and it looks great and lights the whole room so well. It arrived on the promised date, was well packaged and had very clear instructions on how to attach the bulb and shade. I would highly recommend this company and their product!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Good value for good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bedside or side table lamp. The instructions were clear, assembly was quick, and the lamp even came with an energy-efficient bulb! The shade fabric seems to be of good quality. I also like the feel of the pull chain mechanism–it's very satisfying. I have not tested the USB port yet, as it will only occasionally be used for recharging an e-reader. But for someone who falls asleep to their phone's music, podcasts, or a white-noise app, the port is a great addition.
customer_reviews.author: Kristian G.

customer_reviews.title: One is amazing, one is floppy and loose
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 lamps for our bedroom. My husband unpacked them and took the tags off. Well one is perfect and the other one the silver light stand is loose and wobbles the light all over. So the one that is tight and right is amazing and we love. The loose and floppy one, well let's say we do not turn on very often. The USB plug is great for our phones. And we love the style on the light.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small lamp
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this lamp. Traveling by cruiser, and needed small attractive lamp that wasn’t top-heavy (so wouldn’t tip over easily), that was energy efficient. All that AND provides bright, but warm light to our salon area so we no longer need ugly overhead lighting. I’m going to order more for bedroom and living room at home when we return. You won’t regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Swansong

customer_reviews.title: Love mine
customer_reviews.text: The bulb that came in the box was surprisingly good. I bought this to test with my nightstand. Once I put it together (was slightly confused at first) I set it up and it's great. I may buy other for the other night stand. 2 of them could easily light a room. Good job guys. Its reasonably inexpensive and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Read the description carefully.
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I thought it would be and the light fixture was bulb-like instead of more of a LED design like I thought it was going to be. That may have been my bad in not reading the description carefully. I love my other Brighttech floor lamp!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this lamp. Well made and I love the USB port on the lamp which makes it convenient to plug in my phone. It takes up a very small space but the light is bright enough for the bedroom. I bought two of these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp. It is perfect for bedside and provides a nice, soft light for our family room. I bought for of them. It is also so nice to have the USB plug in each one. I always have my phone, Kindle, and iPod Touch fully charged! The lamps are very easy to assemble and even come with a light bulb. I recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: L Parker

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: This little lamp was perfect for a small nightstand between two twin beds. We were renting a condo for the summer, but they didn't have a bed side lamp. Not only was this lamp very affordable, it is very attractive. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah G.

customer_reviews.title: Love the style
customer_reviews.text: I use this lamp as a bedside lamp and it looks very classy. Love the style,, I got two of the lamps with the brown base. Lampshade looks great both when lamp is turned off and when it's on. Nice that it comes with an LED bulb. The pull string makes it easy to turn on and off when in bed. The USB port is great for charging my phone at night. Charger works when lamp is both on and off. My teenage daughter said it looks like a lamp from a hotel. It's a great little lamp for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble (it's a lamp, so really.. it should never be difficult). I've had it for a week. The lighting is great with the supplied bulb. It lights up my entire bedroom. The color of the light works well with the lampshade. The USB port is on the right side (perpendicular to the power cord, rather than parallel to it) which is a little awkward if you want the lamp to your left when you're in bed. Aesthetically, it looks better that way, but logistically it's just awkward. Not a problem though. Overall 5 stars so far.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Wilder

customer_reviews.title: Looking forward the best next thing!
customer_reviews.text: It started great however it proved to be a poor lamp! After a few month, I decide not to work again by working the ne day and then not the next. The flickering while trying to turn the lamp on! Unfortunately the lamp has been annihilated and thrown in the garbage! Love the style such a shame it was poorly made!
customer_reviews.author: Acoustík

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bedside lamp
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little bedside lamp! I was looking for something small for my bedside and this is just perfect. I love that it has a pull chain as I often put on lotion before I go to bed and now I don't have to worry about that when I turn off the lamp. Great bright light too.
customer_reviews.author: S. Back

customer_reviews.title: The Right Size and Right Design
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for - something simple yet stylish - something small but bright. Looks good sitting on my small end table as though it was made to be there. The USB port for charging my phone is an added plus.
customer_reviews.author: rayalen

customer_reviews.title: Handy!
customer_reviews.text: I like having my lamp also have a USB charger in it. Have been using it for a few months and really like it. Only complaints is that there is little to no weight in the bottom of the stand so it can easily be knocked over....but no too bothered by this!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Buying more!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 3 of these little lamps so far (2 in the living room and 1 on my bedroom nightstand) and will most likely buy more in the future for other rooms. They are adorable, put out the perfect light, and the USB ports are so perfect and convenient. No fighting to plug chargers in hehind the furniture anymore or fighting over adapter blocks (because the kids are constantly losing theirs). Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SunniFC

customer_reviews.title: Love the minimalist look.
customer_reviews.text: I love the minimalist look of this lamp. Also, the size is perfect for me in that it leaves space for other things on my end table. The amount of light that it gives is also just right. I bought one lamp a few weeks ago for my guest bedroom. I liked it so much that I bought another one last week.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Great aesthetic
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is super cute! I can't speak much on the brightness since I replaced them with smart bulbs, but the aesthetic is very nice. Only issue is that the shade is very wobbly, it's tricky to get it to sit straight. Liked it so much that I got two
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bedside lamp for our night stand. Perhaps not the best light for reading (since the light is soft and mostly directed towards the ceiling), but it provides great general lighting for our purposes. The pulldown switch is convenient to use, and the USB jack is a nice plus. Edit: 6/2/2018 This lamp broke and no longer functions after 5-6 months of routine use. The light switch no longer functions, even after changing to multiple new light bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: DTM15

customer_reviews.title: OK, but could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2. One for each side of the bed. Nice for the price and comes with a bulb, but could be better. Needs a bit more weight, needs an anti-skid bottom (easily slides on a glass surface), needs to have the USB outlet directly opposite the power plug (this would make it universal without regard to which side of the bed it is on), and needs to have more space between the bottom of the shade and the top of the base (makes the operation of the chain pull easier and more convenient).
customer_reviews.author: WAB

customer_reviews.title: Good lamp for it's use.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 lamps for bedside tables. They work well, give off good light and the USB port is handy. However, for $40 each I expected slightly larger lamps. My fault for not measuring out the 5"x5" dimension parameters. The build quality seemed good. Mine weren't crooked or peeling. Packaged well to prevent damage, although it appeared they were repacked and sent to me. Overall, a decent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Todd H

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is perfect for small tables and spaces. The USB port at the bottom makes it super useful- I have it in a small room with few outlets so the fact that it serves double duty is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: imkrisp

customer_reviews.title: Best thing for in-bed phone users!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this lamp. I bought it because I wanted something smaller than my floor lamp for my bedside. I also wanted the USB port because the outlets are too far from my bed for my six-foot phone charger to comfortably reach. Not only is the lamp itself great (casts plenty of light, looks nice with the shade, comes with a light bulb) but now I have the ease of connecting my phone charger right to the lamp and having all six feet of my cord available. If you like to use your phone in bed, I definitely recommend this lamp! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: the_third_outlaw

customer_reviews.title: Calming Lights
customer_reviews.text: We used these lights for our nightstand in our bedroom. They add the perfect amount of light. We love that they have the USB port so we can charge our devices at night. The pull switch on the light to turn it on and off is never inconvenient to reach. The lights add a very zen feel to our bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Nelson

customer_reviews.title: so so
customer_reviews.text: Got two of these. One leans to the side. It is bent from the factory. Ok quality overall. USB port is difficult to get a plug into but it does work. Would have given it 4 stars if the price had been $14 or $15 bucks. I paid $27 and for that price I expect more. One pro is that it did come with a light bulb.
customer_reviews.author: dbsa

customer_reviews.title: Nice styling.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for what I was looking for. Well made. Assembly - how many ____ does it take to screw in a lightbulb. If your answer is more than one, than you shouldn't be shopping for lamps.
customer_reviews.author: Jon M.

customer_reviews.title: The bedside lamp I never knew I needed
customer_reviews.text: The USB port charger was what influenced my decision to buy this lamp - that and the fact that it looked like it would like fit in perfectly with the rest of my bedroom. It was relatively easy to put together, and it adds such a nice, calming atmosphere to my bedroom. Also great to have the port for my phone!
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Best side table lamps!
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these in our bedroom on our night stands. They are modern and really cute and give off a decent amount of light. They have a usb port which comes in handy. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: PJR

customer_reviews.title: Nice inexpensive small lamp
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace a very old bedroom lamp and it is the perfect size with a modern look. It is placed on our headboard which has a shelf top about 2' above the bed. The light output is perfect for reading in bed and easy to turn on/off with the pull chain.
customer_reviews.author: W. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Good lamp with a slight rustic retro feel
customer_reviews.text: Good well put together product. The pull chain is a nice retro touch, though I would prefer a rocker on the base. It would be easier to reach on a crowded nightstand. having a USB is handy. I did not check the output amps, it should be enough to handle phones. All in all I like the product and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: edo

customer_reviews.title: Bright bulb
customer_reviews.text: It's a lamp... with a USB port. So yeah... (but seriously the bulb it comes with is crazy bright, you might consider a dimmer bulb for a bedroom. In case you're wondering, it's a fairly neutral white light. Not blue at all and only has a warm yellow-ish feel because of the shade.)
customer_reviews.author: PirateGHz

customer_reviews.title: Too bright
customer_reviews.text: This is a good value... but it's REALLY bright and there's no dimming feature. It's located on my bed stand - the last place I want blinding light in my eyes. For this reason I rarely find myself using it. Alas, it's better than no loft at all and the usb charger is convenient.
customer_reviews.author: PracticalPete

customer_reviews.title: Best-purchase-ever.
customer_reviews.text: Best-purchase-ever. There is no better thing than plugging those miserable short cables to an outlet that is so near to you. The finishing is very good, the colors are as described, and the light is super soft, good enough for reading and relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana and Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Liked the first one so much I bought a second!
customer_reviews.text: Attractive, understated over-all look. Nicely weighted at the base for stability. And the USB port is exactly what my partner and I needed for charging our phones overnight, and cleaned up the cords trailing to the outlets under the bed. Just be aware that this light may be too bright for switching on first thing in the morning. It's a pleasant color temperature, and the shade diffuses it nicely for gentle evening light...but still enough lumens to jump start your pupils in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: CAA

customer_reviews.title: Small Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Ok this nice little lamp, but it is really little. I think I could actually blow this into a new location on my bedside table, that’s how light and little this is. However, it does charge up your phone and it does have a nice light but it’s small.
customer_reviews.author: Sherok

customer_reviews.title: Nice bedside light
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little bedside light. Simple, yet bright. I like the pull chain much better than those lights with the switch on the cord. The USB port for charging is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A very nice little lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love this little lamp. It is the perfect size for a side table but bright enough to light the room while you watch tv or socialize. The USB port is a huge plus. The only down side is that the shade is very low which makes pulling the chain a tiny bit awkward, but I have it connected to a switch and it works wonderfully
customer_reviews.author: dlouisezy

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: This is a higher quality lamp than I expected.Perfect for bedside where I keep my tablet plugged in for reading.LED bulb provided works fine but I put in a lower wattage as my preference.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew P. Mullane

customer_reviews.title: Charming lamp a fantastic buy !
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t be happier with this lamp. It is perfect for my small bedside table. It not only brightens the room but gives a cozy feeling. The workmanship is excellent and the pull on/ off chain certainly compliments its appearance. A great buy for the money !
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Strohofer

customer_reviews.title: Ok, not great quality
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box and returned it, not because it didn't function or was bad, simply because it was too cheaply made for a nice home. It looked better online but hey, it's not expensive and for a kids room or a spare room it would do the trick
customer_reviews.author: Kenwoodrobb

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking lamps, especially with Phillip hue a19 color
customer_reviews.text: Wife and I really like the lamps. The size, the port for charging and the lamp shade. I do not like that it is more expensive than others of the same type and sized and do not like that it slides on furniture easily. Needs some kind of rubber feet 🦶 added to the bottom which I will get at a dollar store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Brightech Grace LED USB Bedside Table & Desk Lamp – Modern Lamp with Soft, Ambient Light, Unique Lampshade & Functional USB Port – Perfect for Table in Bedroom, Living Room, or Office – Havana Brown
feature_bullets: GORGEOUS MODERN LAMP THAT LOOKS GREAT WITH ANY DÉCOR: The Grace LED USB Table and Desk Lamp looks beautiful amid contemporary, mid century modern, or industrial décor. It has an extended open top and a neutral linen shade that hovers over a petite base (5 x 5 inches) of solid wood which is available in Havana Brown or Classic Black. The unique modern style and size of this lamp makes it the perfect bedside table, office lamp, or living room side table lamp.

CONVENIENT DESK AND TABLE LAMP: The base of this decorative and unique desk and table lamp contains an easy access USB port so that you can charge your mobile phones, tablets, kindle readers, laptops, and other electronic devices. The USB port functions regardless of whether the lamp is on or off. Its stylish pull chain also makes it easy to turn the light on or off without having to get up and flip a switch. The convenience of this desk and table lamp makes it perfect for your home or office.

BEAUTIFUL WARM LIGHT FOR HOME OR OFFICE: The Grace LED Desk and Table Lamp gives off warm, beautiful light that will create a cozy and comfortable space for any room in your home or office. This lamp is the perfect side table lamp that gives off soft room lighting to enlighten your bedroom, living room, den, nursery, meditation room, or office. This lamp does not have the glare of overhead lights or exposed bulbs as its neutral linen shade softens the light giving your room a warm ambient glow.

LONG LASTING & ENERGY SAVING INDOOR LAMP: The Brightech Grace Desk and Table Lamp includes a 9.5 Watt power saving LED light so that you will never have to replace a bulb. It’s advanced 3,000K warm white LED technology with 800 lumens allows this lamp to outshine lamps that depend on short lived, energy consuming standard halogen or incandescent bulbs. This LED lighting will endure for more than 20 years without burning out or overheating.

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED WARRANTY: Our goal at Brightech is to provide creative, innovative, beautiful lighting so that everyone can have quality, high end lighting. We proudly stand behind all of our products 100% and offer a full 3 year warranty. We are committed to making sure you love your purchase, so if for any reason you are not satisfied, please contact us and we will make things right. (Purchases from AmazonWarehouseDeals or any other third party seller do not qualify for our warranty)
